title: OIC Secretary-General receives Pakistanâ€™s permanent representative
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 1 (APP):Secretary-General of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC), Hissein Brahim Taha, on Tuesday received at the OIC General Secretariat headquarters in Jeddah, Syed Mohammad Fawad Sher, Permanent Representative of Pakistan to the OIC.
During the meeting, the two sides discussed ways to strengthen cooperation between the OIC and Pakistan and efforts to advance Joint Islamic Action.
They also reviewed key issues on the OIC agenda, said a press release issued here.
